title: Reflections: Ireland
creator_credit: Patrick Carey, John Spencer, Grania O'Shannon and Viscom Productions
brief_description: This beautiful atmospheric film shows various aspects of an Irish landscape, which is particularly emphasised by rivers, wind and sea. Interesting use of sounds, eg birds chirping, water flowing and the use of traditional Irish folk music played by Paddy Moloney and the Chieftains.
